items.sentence: Tom will probably be the first one to get here today.
Tom will likely not be able to resist the temptation.
There was some chewing gum on the sole of Tom's shoe.
Some chewing gum was stuck to the sole of Tom's shoe.
I had a hunch something pleasant was going to happen.
I had a bad headache. That's why I went to bed early.
It'll take a lot of money to build that kind of wall.
Do you remember what Tom told us just before he left?
I can't believe that you used to be friends with Tom.
I eat raw sauerkraut whenever I'm taking antibiotics.
